Tuesday

Introduce yourself!

5 minutes

Introduce yourself to everyone on VerdantLearn’s first GIS refreshers course “Find and use environmental data”! Please add your location to the map, including your name (as the title - replace the location name), current role and an example of how you use GIS. Take a moment to comment on someone else’s post to say hello and respond to their self-introduction
